familyGathering.heading: Family Gathering
familyGathering.body: We love catering for entire families. So please bring everyone along for a special meal with your loved ones. We'll provide a memorable experience for all.

specialEvents.heading: Special Events
specialEvents.body: Whether it's a romantic dinner or a special date you're celebrating with others we'll look after you. We'll be sure to mark your special date with an unforgettable meal.

socialEvents.heading: Social Events
socialEvents.body: Are you looking to have a large social event? No problem! We're more than happy to cater for big parties. We'll work with you to make your event a hit with everyone.
